summary: Bunch of tweaks focused on making the game lower fantasy. descriptionHtml: Bunch of tweaks focused on making the game lower fantasy.Â  Removes starting spells, replaces racial powers with passive ones that trigger situationally, removes random enchantments in loot and on merchants, removes barter gold from merchants (you'll need to trade items by buying more than you can pay and then covering the cost by giving them gems/etc if you don't have the gold), does a bunch of other stuff also, not finished, just uploading it right now to save it for when the new computer comes. Split into 5 esp files for some modularity.
author: VincentEttrich
